roleset.name: shape again
roleset.note: RESHAPE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'reshape' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet doesn't have 'reshape' but does have 'shape' as class build-26.1; other framed members include build, develop, grow, make. (from reshape.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: ...the power that [Dorrance family members]-1 intend *trace*-1 to wield in *trace*-1 reshaping the troubled food company.
